title: Beard Science
description: Guest bailiffed by ABC News Senior White House Correspondent Jake Tapper! Friends Mike, Mike and Dan seek a ruling on a modified but highly charged game of beard chicken.
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
